title: 【解密】WIRELESS REDSTONE 无线红石
author: Xiao_Tao_Zi
txt_content:
本帖最后由 像素君 于 2017-8-9 21:28 编辑 

简介 InfoThis is another puzzle map by DJ Disco which has INVISIBLE REDSTONE! It sound quite hard but it's actually simple, you just have to understand the redstone which are obviously invisible.It's been a long time since i did another puzzle map.This map took me about 15-17 hours of hard work and it was entirely made by DJ Disco he was the tester, commander, and builder, and I don't know why I'm typing in third person.And this map is quite confusing and has a bit of a story.Well I have nothing to say that's why I hope you'll have fun and not rage quit. Plus it's multiplayer compatible that's why have fun with your friends too.这又是一个由DJ Disco制作的解密地图，地图里有无限红石！看起来很难但其实很简单，你只需要懂那些隐形的红石即可。离上一个解密已经有很长时间了。这个地图花了我大概15-17小时的制作时间，此地图完全由DJ Disco制作（包括测试，建筑，指令），然后我也不知道为什么我要用第三人称写。这个地图会有一点迷惑，地图有一点故事。废话不多说，希望你玩的开心并不要焦虑。这张地图支持多人。
